remarks: If a nonempty finite friendship graph is k-regular, its order is k(k-1)+1.  This corresponds to claim 3 in [Huneke] p. 2:  "Next we claim that the number n of vertices in G is exactly k(k-1)+1.".  Variant of ~ frgregordn0 , using the definition ` RegUSGrph ` ( ~ df-rusgra ).
